But while men were cruel and vindictive, or criminally negligent of the solemn responsibilities devolving upon them, God had not forgotten 
                                                                           77
to be gracious to his suffering servants. An angel was sent from Heaven to release the apostles. As he neared the Roman prison, the earth trembled beneath his feet, the whole city was shaken by the earthquake, and the prison walls reeled like a reed in the wind. The heavily bolted doors flew open; the chains and fetters fell from the hands and feet of every prisoner.
